title: If the enemy team picks double ADC into my Rammus, my first thought shouldn't be 'oh shit'
body:
Because I'm going to melt in 1-2 seconds once the game hits 15 minutes, even if I'm ahead.

This is absurd.

replies.body:
Double dps comp shouldn't threaten a tank? This isn't dota- you shouldn't be able to completely hard counter a large number of enemies because you chose to play a certain champ. He already has an edge on ADCs in ways other tanks do not, no need to make it autowin against 2.

Anyway, that game would have been a nightmare for them. All you would have needed was bramble vest, tabi, and health and you would have been immortal (at 15 minutes).

Tanks are mid game focused. ADCs are supposed to outscale tanks, its how its always been. 

>Due to their potent reach and DPS, marksmen are particularly strong against more durable opponents, namely fighters and tanks, but fall quickly to the burst damage of assassins and mages.

-Lol wiki
Last time I checked, 15 minutes isn't late game. That's "laning phase has just barely ended".

Also, if ADCs cant deal with rammus, hes not broken, because most mages can deal with rammus, especially DPS mages, because rammus's kit punishes him for prioritizing MR over armor.
